channel.title: Kerry-Lynne Findlay
channel.description: Recent news about Kerry-Lynne Findlay, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by globalnews.ca
item.description:
Tory MP breaches conflict-of-interest rules, lobbied on behalf of constituent
British Columbia Tory MP Kerry-Lynne Findlay wrote to Public Works Minister Rona Ambrose last year encouraging her to get her department to enter into talks to renew its lease on a building owned by a constituent. Story continues below. Findlay was the parliamentary secretary to the minister of justice at the time she ... She signed her letter as both the member of Parliament for Delta-Richmond East and as parliamentary secretary. Findlay also included a handwritten message to Ambrose at the bottom of the letter.
